metadata.title: RZ/A3UL: What specific applications require a large amount of DDR memory in RTOS?

sections.content:
Question:
What specific applications require a large amount of DDR memory in RTOS?
Answer:
The memory footprint of RTOS itself is small, but a large amount of memory is required in cases such as when many images are captured at once with an HMI application such as a QR scanner that needs to start immediately, and one of those images is being processed by the RZ/A3UL.
Suitable Products
RZ/A3UL
